name: Joseph Joseph Compo Mountable Food Waste Caddy, Easy-Fill with Adjustable Air Vent Compost Bin, 4 Liters/1 Gallon, Graphite
short_description: Wide bin opening makes scraping food from plates easier. Capacity 4-Liters (1 US Gallon)
Adjustable air vent: Open - helps reduce moisture and odor build-up; Closed - provides insect barrier
Slimline design perfect for storing on the kitchen counter or inside kitchen cabinets. Door mounting bracket included.
Includes 1 x food waste caddy; 1 x bracket; 2 x screws
Wash and dry by hand to clean. Suitable for use with Joseph Joseph IW2 custom-fit liners
Product Size: 11.69" x 4.71" x 6.81"
product_description: This clever caddy has been carefully designed to help reduce the smell from collected food waste. It has a unique, ventilated design that allows air to enter and circulate inside the caddy, which helps to reduce moisture - the main cause of unpleasant odors from decomposing food. In addition, it features a replaceable odor filter in the lid that works in tandem with the fresh air to help trap any smells that do occur. It has an easy-clean polypropylene body, a flip-top lid and a sturdy stainless-steel carry handle. A liner-retaining hole inside ensures any liners stay in place and the rim of the removable lid hides any untidy bag overhang. Perfect for storing on a kitchen counter. Custom-fit liners (IW2) are available separately for the perfect fit. Total capacity (1 US Gallon/4 Liters).

name: Beautiful Kitchen Compost Bin with Smell Proof Lid - Rust Proof and Odorless Compost Bucket for Your Countertop with No Smell Filters - Easy to Clean 1.1 Gallon Bin Looks Great On Any Kitchen Counter
short_description: Effortless Recycling: Revolutionize your kitchen with KIBAGAs’ countertop compost bin, designed for recycling food & other organic waste. Seamlessly support eco-consciousness and contribute to nutrient-rich soil for plants, while fostering a clean kitchen space

Odorless Composting: The compost bin for the kitchen comes with a built-in charcoal filter compartment ensuring odor-free composting and lid air holes providing necessary aeration. With two filter included, you are well equipped. Embrace the fresh vibes!

Practical Premium Design: Built to last with rust-free, powder-coated carbon steel, the kitchen compost bin for your countertop elevates your recycling game. Easy to carry with its wooden handle and a breeze to clean, it's a durable, handy ally in daily life

Spacious Efficiency: Compact yet roomy, the 10.2x7” composting bin boasts a 1.1-gallon volume, providing ample space without hogging your kitchen countertop. Simply add your food scraps throughout the week, keeping your kitchen tidy, eco-friendly & odorless

Upgrade Your Kitchen Aesthetic: Spruce up your kitchen with the compost bin's timeless beige design, jazzed up by a dash of modern flair in its wooden handle and knob. Uniting style and functionality, it's a must-have for your eco-chic kitchen
product_description: Say Hello To Your Kitchen's Newest Eco-Warrior: KIBAGAs’ Countertop Compost Bin! Effortless recycling right in your kitchen. This sleek composting bin is more than just a pretty decor piece, it's a powerhouse of eco-friendliness, ready to tackle all your food scraps and other organic waste. With KIBAGAs' kitchen compost bin for your countertop, you can effortlessly contribute to a more sustainable future while keeping your kitchen tidy and odor-free. It's the perfect blend of style, convenience, and eco-consciousness - a true win-win for you and the planet! Crafted from rust-free, powder-coated carbon steel, the compost bin for your kitchen is built to last. Equipped with a built-in charcoal filter compartment, the kitchen compost bin is the ultimate odor-fighting machine. Plus, with lid air holes for perfect aeration, your kitchen will be fresher than ever. KIBAGA has also got you covered with extra filters. Despite its compact size of 10.2x7”, this bin offers a roomy 1.1-gallon capacity, ensuring ample space for your kitchen scraps without crowding your countertop. So feel free to toss those banana peels and apple cores throughout the week without worry. With this bin by your side, your kitchen stays organized & eco-friendly while smelling fresh. With its chic design and modern wooden accents, the composting bin is also an aesthetic addition to your kitchen interior. Who knew composting could be so stylish? So, let’s do it! Upgrade your kitchen with the countertop compost bin, the ultimate solution for effortless waste management. Enjoy the convenience of disposing of food scraps right at your fingertips, without sacrificing precious countertop space, and experience the joy of a cleaner, fresher and more organized home.

name: Joseph Joseph Intelligent Waste Compost Bin Food Waste Caddy with Odor Filter and Ventilation, 1 gallon / 4 liters, Graphite

product_description: This clever compost bin has been carefully designed to help reduce the smell from collected food waste. It has a unique, ventilated design that allows air to enter and circulate inside the caddy, which helps to reduce moisture - the main cause of unpleasant odors from decomposing food. In addition, it features a replaceable odor filter in the lid that works in tandem with the fresh air to help trap any smells that do occur. It has an easy-clean polypropylene body, a flip-top lid and a sturdy stainless-steel carry handle. A liner-retaining hole inside ensures any liners stay in place and the rim of the removable lid hides any untidy bag overhang. Perfect for storing on a kitchen counter, it is also compatible with Stack Recycling Separation Units. Custom-fit, compostable liners (IW2) are available separately for the perfect fit. Wipe clean with a damp cloth. 1 gallon capacity.

name: Compost Bin Kitchen, 1.3 Gallon Farmhouse Kitchen Compost Bin Countertop, Indoor Countertop Compost Bucket with Lid and Charcoal Filters, White
short_description: Large Capacity Compost Bin: 1.3 gallons (7.1” dia./11” height) offers big enough space to collect your organic kitchen and food waste during the week. With this compost bin kitchen, you don't worry about bad smells into your home any more.

Super Cute Farmhouse Design: Designed with the sleek text and vintage look style, this countertop compost bin will surely add a country charm to your kitchen countertops. This farmhouse compost bin fits perfectly with any modern farmhouse decor and cute kitchen accessories, you don’t need to hide this compost container below your sink.

Control Odors Naturally: The airtight lid and charcoal filters can trap and control odors naturally in the bin so you can keep the compost bin in a handy place on your counter until the bin is full. Besides the built-in charcoal filter, you will receive 2 extra filters - each filter can last to 3-4 months.

Durable and Leak-free Material: Our kitchen compost bin countertop is molded in one piece for long-term strength and use, unlike other bins that are welded and easy to rust and leak at the weld points over time. The special coating inside and outside make this indoor compost bin prevent rust and scratches.

Tips for Use and Clean: Simply wash the compost bucket with warm soapy water and gently wipe the lid with a damp cloth after use. Use the sturdy handle to empty the compost bin into your outside food waste bin without any hassle. If you do not want to use the compost bin directly, it is recommended that you put a compost bag over the bin.

name: LALASTAR Countertop Compost Bin with Lid, Made of Sustainable Bamboo Fiber, Odorless Kitchen Compost Bucket, 1 Gallon, Cream
short_description: All Natural: Made from earth-friendly recycled materials including Bamboo Fiber, Corn Starch, the kitchen compost container with lid in itself is biodegradable.

Practical: Store your food scraps, vegetable peelings, tea leaves, flowers, coffee grounds and other compost materials with this compost bucket. Never waste your food scraps again and create your own low carbon rich compost for your garden.
Odorless: The counter compost bin has a vented lid and charcoal filter that absorbs and traps odors inside of the compost bucket. No worry about your kitchen smelly decomposing waste again.
Compact: With a size of 7.2” in diameter & 9” in height, the food composter is the perfect size for holding several days of food waste. Great for countertop, under the sink, or in the pantry.
Stylish: The modern and elegant design of the small compost bin makes it sit pretty on your countertop to collect peels, ends and other scraps. It's Dishwasher safe.

name: Compost Bin Kitchen Counter - 1.3 Gallon Black Stainless Steel Kitchen Compost Bin with Wood Handles & Charcoal Filters x3 Sets - Double Layered Charcoal Filters - Perfect Size for Countertop
short_description: DOUBLE LAYERED CHARCOAL FILTERS - This odorless metal compost bin for kitchen has 2 thick charcoal filters lining the lid to seal smells. With a 1.3 gallon capacity, this is the perfect size food scrap bin for your vegetable peel, fruit flesh, coffee grounds, tea bags and more.

3 SETS OF FILTERS INCLUDED - This compost bucket for kitchen countertop comes with 6 total charcoal filters - 2 already inserted in the lid ready to go out of the box, and 2 replacement sets. We've even included simple step by step instructions to make changing the filters hassle free.

EASY TO USE & CLEAN - The wood handles are comfortable to hold and the black powder coated finish won't show fingerprints . After emptying this portable indoor compost bin into your outdoor compost bin every 2-3 days, hand wash with warm soapy water. Even the charcoal filters can be washed too.

name: RED FACTOR Premium Compost Bin for Kitchen Countertop - Stainless Steel Food Waste Bucket with Innovative Dual Filter Technology - Includes Spare Filters (White, 1.3 Gallon)
short_description: Stylish & Attractive Design – Attractively crafted with a dome-shaped lid, this stylish indoor compost bin can be placed right on your kitchen countertop to provide easy access at all times while adding an elegant look to your kitchen decor.

Completely Odorless – You can keep adding food scraps (such as fruits, vegetables, coffee grounds, egg shells, tea bags etc.) to this kitchen compost bucket without worrying about any bad smell. Unlike other kitchen food containers, this RED FACTOR food waste container is equipped with innovative dual-filter technology with active carbon ingredient and a lid with holes for proper ventilation, neutralizing bad smells even in hot summer days.

High Quality Construction – Built to provide long-term strength and use, this RED FACTOR kitchen compost bin is expertly crafted using durable stainless-steel body that’s resistant to rust, cracks and chips. Single sheet manufacturing technology ensures seamless form with no joints.

Easy to Use – Perfectly sized at 1.3 Gallons (10.8-inch x 8.7-inch x 7.3-inch) to hold considerable amount of food scraps while taking up minimal space in your kitchen so you don't have to make daily trips to the outdoor compost heap. This compost pail is equipped with soft grip handle to ensure ease of use. Easy to clean with soapy water. Not machine washable.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee – We are a small independent company who pride ourselves on the high level of customer care that we offer. At RED FACTOR, we believe in designing high quality yet affordable products that improve lives. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, just contact us and we'll send you a refund or exchange the product.

short_description: FEATURED IN BON APPETIT & FORBES: Recognized by renowned magazines, EPICA’s compost bin is a perfectly sized marvel for your kitchen, compact yet spacious enough to hold days' worth of compostable organic waste. Measures 7.16" in diameter x 11" high.
